```
package com.imooc.oprater;

public class CharDemo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        char ch='a',count=1;
        while (ch<='z') {
        	  System.out.print(ch+"");
        	  ch++;
        	  if(count==13) {
        		  System.out.println();
        	  }
        	  count++;
        }
	}

}

```
